Accuracy.description: The correctness of the final response regarding the deleted word.

Completeness.description: Whether all necessary steps were taken to reach the final answer.

Reasoning Traceability.description: The ability to follow the agent's reasoning process through the steps taken.

Resource Utilization.description: Efficiency in terms of resources used by the agent (e.g., time, computational resources).

Adherence to Instructions.description: The degree to which the agent followed the given task instructions.

Timeliness.description: How quickly the solution was provided.
